description: GET request that returns network target block times
title: GetStxSupplyResponse

unlocked_percent.description: String quoted decimal number of the percentage of STX that have unlocked

total_stx.description: String quoted decimal number of the total possible number of STX

unlocked_stx.description: String quoted decimal number of the STX that have been mined or unlocked

block_height.description: The block height at which this information was queried
